apiwrappers Package¶

analyzable Module¶

class apiwrappers.analyzable.Analyzable(id)¶

Bases: object

This is an abstracted class for other audio related instances.

The subclasses of this have to have a function which returns a chromagram.

Attributes:
id: id of the analyzable.Can be spotify,echonest or musescore id depending on the subclass inheriting it.
get_chromagram()¶

This function has to return a chromagram. This is what characterizes analyzable

connectionsettings Module¶

class apiwrappers.connectionsettings.ConnectionSettings¶

Bases: object

Provides connection configurations for echonest and spotify apis.

attributes:

musescore_base:base url for echonest

spotify_base:base url for spotify

echonest_base:base url for echonest

echonest Module¶

This module provides wrappers for required echonest api functions.

apiwrappers.echonest.check_analysis_complete(track_id)¶

Checks if analysis of a track is ready on Echonest

Args:
track_id: track id of target track
Returns:
tuple(json data for the track profile)
apiwrappers.echonest.check_file_exists(audio_file)¶

Checks if a file already uploaded to Echonest before

Args:
audio_file:path of the target audio file
Returns:
tuple (json data for the file,True if file already uploaded)
apiwrappers.echonest.create_echonest_features(audio_summary)¶

Create set of echonest features from audio summary portion of Echonest API results

Args:
audio_summary:Dictionary of echonest features
Returns:
EchonestFeatures instance with extracted echonest features
apiwrappers.echonest.extract_artist_from_text(text)¶

Wrapper for Echonest’s extractArtist method.

Args:
text: text to extract artists
Returns:
List of (artist id,artist name)
apiwrappers.echonest.get_data_by_md5(md5)¶

Get Echonest track profile data for the given md5

Args:
md5: target md5 values
Returns:
Track profile data as dict
apiwrappers.echonest.get_echonest_features_for_local_file(audio_file)¶

Get echonest features for a local audio file.

It first checks if echonest analysis of the file already exists. If not audio file is uploaded to Echonest for further analysis

Args:
audio_file:path of audio file
Returns:
EchonestFeatures instance with extracted echonest features
apiwrappers.echonest.get_echonest_track_for_file(audio_file)¶

Uploads an audio file to Echonest for acquiring its analysis later

Args:
audio_file: Path of audio file
Returns:
track id of uploaded file
apiwrappers.echonest.get_echonestsong_by_spotifyid(spotify_id)¶

Get echonestsong for a given spotify track id

spotify_id: spotify id of a spotify track

Returns:

EchonestSong if a song is found with specified foreign spotify id

None if no song is found with spotify_id

apiwrappers.echonest.get_songs_for_artist(artist_id)¶

Get list of echonest songs for a given artist_id

Args:
artist_id: Echonest artist id
Returns:
List of EchonestSong
apiwrappers.echonest.parse_echonest_analysisurl(url)¶

Parse chroma from echonest analysis url of a track

url: echonest analysis url

Returns:
12 dimensional chroma matrix
apiwrappers.echonest.songs_by_artist_id(id)¶

Creates list of songs given an artist id

Args:
id: Echonest artist id
Returns:
A list of EchonestSong instances

echonestfeatures Module¶

class apiwrappers.echonestfeatures.EchonestFeatures(feature_dict)¶

Class represents Echonest Features

attributes:

tempo: Tempo from the echonest analysis

duration: Duration from the echonest analysis

timesig: Time signature from the echonest analysis

key: Key from the echonest analysis

speechiness: Speechiness from the echonest analysis

chroma: Chromagram from the echonest analysis

echonestsong Module¶

class apiwrappers.echonestsong.EchonestSong(id, name, preview_url)¶

Bases: apiwrappers.analyzable.Analyzable

Class representing an Echonest Song (in very basic way).

Attributes:

id: id of the Echonest Song.

name: name of the Echonest Song.

preview_url: preview_url of the Echonest Song.

features: EchonestFeatures of EchonestSong.

musescore Module¶

apiwrappers.musescore.create_score(score_id)¶

create a score for given MuseScore score id

Args:
score_id: MuseScore id
Returns:
Score instance

musicdatatype Module¶

Enum class for chroma analysis type

0:AUDIO
1:MIDI
2:ECHONEST

score Module¶

class apiwrappers.score.Score(id, title, subtitle, composer, mp3, midi)¶

Bases: apiwrappers.analyzable.Analyzable

This class represents a MuseScore Score

Attributes:

id: MuseScore id of the score

title: title of the score

subtitle: subtitle of the score

composer: composer of the score

mp3: mp3 of the score

midi: midi of the score

features: EchonestFeatures for the mp3 track of the score uplodaded to Echonest

get_artists_from_echonest()¶

Get list of the artist for the metadata of the score from the echonest extractArtist method

Returns:
list of tuple(artist id, artist name)
get_chromagram(mode=0)¶

Get chromagram for the score

Creates chromagram either from mp3,(utils.get_chromagram_from_audio()) midi (utils.get_chromagram_from_midi()) or echonest analysis(apiwrappers.echonest.get_echonest_features_for_local_file()) of the score

Args:
mode: MusicDataType.
Returns:
Chromagram np.array
get_queries()¶

Get list of queries from the metadata of the score for querying audio sources spotify or echonest

The list of queries are created from title composer and subtitle of the score. From lower index to higher of the list strictness of the length and coverage of the query decreases and probability of finding results for the query increases:

strictness:query
0:title + composer + subtitle
1:title + composer + subtitle with stopwords removed
2:title + composer
3:title + composer with stopwords removed
4:title
5:title with stopwords removed
Identical queries with lower strictness removed from the list
Returns:
list of tuples (query,strictness)
metadata_match()¶

Queries music sources by using the queries of get_queries() and return a song if its metadata is matching with metadata of the score.

Returns:
a SpotifyTrack or EchonestSong if there is a match None if there is no match

spotify Module¶

This module provides wrappers for required spotify api functions.

apiwrappers.spotify.create_spotify_track(id)¶

Create a spotify track given an spotify id

Returns:
SpotifyTrack instance for given id
apiwrappers.spotify.get_spotify_uri_by_id(spotify_id)¶

Get spotify uri for the given spotify id

Returns:
spotify uri
apiwrappers.spotify.get_top_tracks_for_artist(artist_id)¶

Get top tracks given an artist id

Returns:
List of SpotifyTrack
apiwrappers.spotify.query_spotify(query)¶

Query spotify with the given query

Return:
List of SpotifyTrack
apiwrappers.spotify.songs_by_artist_name(artist)¶

Get list of spotify songs given an artist name

Returns:
List of SpotifyTrack

spotifytrack Module¶

class apiwrappers.spotifytrack.SpotifyTrack(id, name, preview_url, uri)¶

Bases: apiwrappers.analyzable.Analyzable

This class represents a SpotifyTrack
Attributes:

id: Spotify id of the track

name: name of the spotify track

preview_url: preview_url of the spotify track

uri: uri of the spotify track

features: EchonestFeatures for the spotify track

get_chromagram(mode=0)¶

Get chromagram for the spotify track

Creates chromagram either from mp3(utils.get_chromagram_from_audio()) or echonest analysis (apiwrappers.echonest.get_echonestsong_by_spotifyid()) of the spotify track.Chromagram may return None if there is no matching echonest song for the spotify track

Args:
mode: MusicDataType. either should be audio or echonest
Returns:
Chromagram representation.
